body.p: The right or wrong spelling of terms in technical documents is very important. Thus, it's always important to carefully spell-check your manuals, making sure that both technical and general terms are correctly spelt. In this section, I introduce some common spell-checking utilities. There is no POSIX.1-2008 standardised spell-checker.
The difficulty in spell-checking mdoc documents is foremost the parsing of macros. Consider spell-checking checking the following snippet.
By now we understand that Fl and Ar are macros. But it's unreasonable to expect a spell-checker to do so. Thus, spell-checking manuals often raise many false-positives.
